Articles.Content:
False.

The user below me has an unhealthy love for 17x9 px flags.

True. Half of the first movie. AND I BARELY SURVIVED IT. False (ninja'd)

The user below me finished this song and came out alive.

True but my brain is running out of my ears.

The user below helped us get to over 700 in the counting thread.

True.

The user below has a healthy love for 17x9 px flags.

False.

The person below has had a disagreement with their boss.

False, I don't have one.

The user below me hasn't watched Space 1999.

False

the person below me has used a netbook and liked it. (netbooks are pretty cool)

Never used it, so sorry.

The next user exist as an animal. (Hey, humans are also animals... )

Indeed, I loved mine. It was extremely convenient to have a small computer along with me. It hasn't seen much use ever since I bought a Nexus 7 tablet, though.

Whoops, no. I'm actually fungal.

Person below me plays Minecraft.

Nope, and you're ninja'd.

The next user exist as an animal. (Hey, humans are- do I have to repeat this over and over...?)

True.

The user below me does not play World of Tanks and is therefore dead to me.

True, and you're probably dead to me.

I predict that the next user would be dead to me if they say "... dead to me." (If you don't, that's a relieve.)

Um... False?

The user below me does not know of "real life"

I'm confused as to whether this is a trick question. So i'm going to say false.

The user below me has a piece of purple cloth somewhere in their house.

False, as far as I know,

And you got me confused with that trick question stuff you just said...

The user below me has destroyed Gilly with a glitch because it was on a collision course with Kerbin

False.

The next user has a hard time getting on the forum on the weekend.

False, (I'm constantly browsing the forums while ksp loads after a crash, or after I have to close it due to lag from my odd designs)

The user below me has landed on Gilly

False. Just orbited.

User below have landed on Tylo and returned in a spacecraft that is not overkilled.

[ninja'd] False, I have never made a return trip from Tylo.

True, I am very close to having landed on everything.

False, because you didn't say anything

The user below me will tell me what "ninjad" means (I'm serious)

http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=ninja'd

The user below me has a lively social life.

What is this "social life" of which you speak

The user below has a interesting signature .

True.

The person below me is a fan of one of the Battlestar Galactica series.

False.

The user below is offended by my signature.

Not sure if purist bashing...

... or modder bashing.

The user below me has seen the meme mentioned in the text above
